description.narrative: By 2020, young children participate in quality and inclusive ECE services,which contributes to Early Childhood Development, Early Learning, Learning Outcomes, Wash In Schools And Ecd Centres, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, all young children, especially the most vulnerable, are supported to survive, thrive and reach their full potential for success in school and later in live

participating-org.narrative: CIVIL SOCIETY ORGANIZATION: Community based organization

sector.narrative: System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary policy, leadership, and budget
WASH - risk informed programming including climate resilience disaster and conflict

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020, young children participate in quality and inclusive ECE services

description.narrative: During 2019, with UNICEF's support, the Government of Georgia, local municipalities and state universities made further progress in the implementation of the Law on Early and Preschool Education and Care (EPEC) and the national standards. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:14/01/2019

title.narrative: c2a. Early learning policy and early learning programme including quality early learning curriculum and standards - score (1-4), see guidance

target.value: 2019:Authorisation regulations for Early and Preschool Education adopted by the Government and ready for implementation

title.narrative: System Strengthening - Education sector planning - Education Sector Plan or Transitional Education Sector Plan developed with UNICEF support available
